member.summary: The right to set or reset the signaled state of a named event.

member.summary: The right to wait on a named event.

member.name: M:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity.RemoveAccessRule(System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAccessRule)
member.summary: Searches for an access control rule with the same user and (allow or deny) as the specified access rule, and with compatible inheritance and propagation flags; if such a rule is found, the rights contained in the specified access rule are removed from it.
member.param: An that specifies the user and to search for, and a set of inheritance and propagation flags that a matching rule, if found, must be compatible with. Specifies the rights to remove from the compatible rule, if found.
member.returns: true if a compatible rule is found; otherwise, false.
member.exception: rule is null.

member.name: M:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity.RemoveAccessRule(System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreAccessRule)

member.returns: true if a compatible rule is found; otherwise false.
member.exception: rule is null.
